law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, a person may not:...
law.text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of law, a person may not:
operate a crane in the State for the purpose of construction work or demolition work unless the person holds a Certificate of Competence; or
authorize a person to operate a crane in the State for the purpose of construction work or demolition work unless the operator holds a Certificate of Competence.
